alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 7:27PM AKDT until March 24 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM Thursday... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. East winds gusting to 40 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...North of Sagwon. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds gusting as to 40 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. Winds will decrease Thursday morning and visibility will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
